analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Anātāpī, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anottāpī abhabbo sambodhāya, abhabbo nibbānāya, abhabbo anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya.
analyzed: anātāpī bhikkhave bhikkhu anottāpī abhabbaḥ sambodhāya abhabbaḥ nibbānāya abhabbaḥ anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya

original: Ātāpī ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ottāpī bhabbo sambodhāya, bhabbo nibbānāya, bhabbo anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāyā”ti.
analyzed: ātāpī ca kho bhikkhave bhikkhu ottāpī bhabbaḥ sambodhāya bhabbaḥ nibbānāya bhabbaḥ anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya ati
idhā iva sambodhim anuttaram phusa iti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
